response.overview: In Echoes, Sydney's joyful morning with her sisters takes an unexpected turn when her boyfriend, arrives, setting the stage for a day of emotional upheaval. Despite her deep love for Demetri, a night out at a bar brings her ex, back into her life, stirring up old feelings and igniting jealousy. As Demetri struggles with inappropriate texts from an old flame and the weight of a family tragedy, he finds solace in his friend, further complicating matters.
response.title: Echoes
